explains: n. 核武器；核能发电厂；核潜艇

sentences.en: He wanted to nuke the area.
sentences.cn: 他想以核武器攻击这个地区。

sentences.en: Rock samples taken from the remains of an asteroid about twice the size of the 6-nuke-wide asteroid that eradicated the dinosaurs has been dated to be 3.47 billion years old.
sentences.cn: 那个从一颗小行星残骸中采集的岩石样本的年代已达34.7亿年，其大小大约是导致恐龙灭绝的那颗直径为6颗核弹的小行星的两倍。

sentences.en: Why did you start to write Nuke?
sentences.cn: 是什么促使你开始写NUKE这个程序？
